name: Submarena
description:
Made with love in 14 days for LOWREZJAM 2022(Limitation: "Create a game with a resolution of 64x64 pixels or less.")

Click to move, fire torpedo, or use sonar.
Surface to refill air - then dive!
[Turn sound up if you want to hear enemy movements]

Music/SFX from Alex-Productions and FreeSound.org.
